name: Blocks Breaker
description:
This is my first game ever to be published in the Play Store, an Arkanoid-like game for Android. You don't have to pay anything, I would love some feedback, though!

Keep in mind that you should allow Unknown Developer apps in your phone to be able to download this.
This is my second game ever, I've done everything from sound effects to sprites and I hope you enjoy it! :) :) Thank you very much!

You can find the project files in my github:

https://github.com/Whitfurrows/BlocksBreaker
